data.author: limjohnny88

changelog.release_notes:
This is the third release of the Mondaine watch face for Pebble. 

If you really like this watch face and would like to support me. You can make a dontation to me via Payal: mod88@live.com.sg 

v1.2
Added Stop2Go sweeping hand option
Added bluetooth status detection

v1.1
Added black dial
User configurable date, second hand and hourly vibration option

v1.0
Basic watch face

This is the second release of the Mondaine watch face for Pebble. 

The watch face now comes with both black and white dial. 
With user configurable date, second hand and hourly vibration option. 

If you really like this watch face and would like to support me. 
You can make a dontation to me via Payal: mod88@live.com.sg

This is the first release of the Mondaine watch face for Pebble.

If you really like this watch face and would like to support me.
You can make a dontation to me via Payal: mod88@live.com.sg
